name: Block Hexa Hero
description:
Block Hexa Hero is very easy to play and pleasurable game for all ages. All you have to do is just tap and move blocks to fill up the square and collect block pieces to level up!

How to play this Block Hexa Puzzle:
- Drag the blocks to move them.
- Try to fit them all in the frame
- Blocks can't be rotated.
- No time limits. You can stay as long as you want.
